creator: Finnew Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Looking for the perfect one-stop high-interest savings account to park and grow your earnings? The Niyo Global Savings Account is an exclusive bank account for international travellers.

The integrated Niyo Global app lets you manage your savings and wealth accounts seamlessly whether you are in India or travelling across the globe for business, pleasure, or studies.

Why choose Niyo Global?
✔️Premium High-interest digital savings account with up to 5% interest p.a. with a monthly payout
✔️ZERO forex markup* saves you 3-5% on all forex transactions
✔️FREE airport lounge access* at international & domestic terminals in India
✔️International VISA Signature debit card to use with any VISA-accepting merchant worldwide
✔️Accepted in 150+ countries, just add money in INR and spend anywhere
✔️Best-in-class acceptance for 100+ currencies, no worries of currency exchange across the world
✔️ZERO commission on direct mutual fund investments
✔️Systematic Investment Plans (SIPs) starting at just ₹100
✔️Track Employees’ Provident Fund (EPF) balance with just your mobile number & OTP
✔️Secured credit card to get full credit against FDs
✔️24x7 in-app live chat support to connect with us no matter where you are in the world

The INR-based Niyo Global international VISA Signature Debit Card lets you travel in style with no forex markup* and a best-in-class app. It’s a one-stop solution to handle your finances—savings and wealth—on the go whether you are in India or travelling to 150+ countries worldwide.

Niyo Global card takes away the hassle of loading different currencies on a multi-currency forex card since it automatically converts INR each time you use it to make a payment in a foreign currency. You no longer need a forex card or a travel card—the Niyo Global card does it all!

How to open a Niyo Global account?
Time: Less than 5 minutes
Documents: PAN, Aadhaar, Passport
Download the Niyo Global App
Verify your mobile number (linked to your Aadhaar and SIM present on your device)
Verify your Email ID
Enter your PAN details
Set your Passcode
Create your Savings, and Wealth accounts by following the simple intuitive steps on the app
If you are looking for a student travel card, the best forex cards for students, or the best business travel card, your search ends here. The Niyo Global card is the only international travel card you will need during your travels to manage all your finances on the go.

Download the app and experience the sheer brilliance of global digital banking with Niyo Global!

*T&C Apply

creator: Finnew Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Looking for the perfect one-stop high-interest savings account to park and grow your earnings? The Niyo Global Savings Account is an exclusive bank account for international travellers.

The integrated Niyo Global app lets you manage your savings and wealth accounts seamlessly whether you are in India or travelling across the globe for business, pleasure, or studies.

Why choose Niyo Global?
✔️Premium High-interest digital savings account with up to 5% interest p.a. with a monthly payout
✔️ZERO forex markup* saves you 3-5% on all forex transactions
✔️FREE airport lounge access* at international & domestic terminals in India
✔️International VISA Signature debit card to use with any VISA-accepting merchant worldwide
✔️Accepted in 150+ countries, just add money in INR and spend anywhere
✔️Best-in-class acceptance for 100+ currencies, no worries of currency exchange across the world
✔️ZERO commission on direct mutual fund investments
✔️Systematic Investment Plans (SIPs) starting at just ₹100
✔️Track Employees’ Provident Fund (EPF) balance with just your mobile number & OTP
✔️Secured credit card to get full credit against FDs
✔️24x7 in-app live chat support to connect with us no matter where you are in the world

The INR-based Niyo Global international VISA Signature Debit Card lets you travel in style with no forex markup* and a best-in-class app. It’s a one-stop solution to handle your finances—savings and wealth—on the go whether you are in India or travelling to 150+ countries worldwide.

Niyo Global card takes away the hassle of loading different currencies on a multi-currency forex card since it automatically converts INR each time you use it to make a payment in a foreign currency. You no longer need a forex card or a travel card—the Niyo Global card does it all!

How to open a Niyo Global account?
Time: Less than 5 minutes
Documents: PAN, Aadhaar, Passport
Download the Niyo Global App
Verify your mobile number (linked to your Aadhaar and SIM present on your device)
Verify your Email ID
Enter your PAN details
Set your Passcode
Create your Savings, and Wealth accounts by following the simple intuitive steps on the app
If you are looking for a student travel card, the best forex cards for students, or the best business travel card, your search ends here. The Niyo Global card is the only international travel card you will need during your travels to manage all your finances on the go.

Download the app and experience the sheer brilliance of global digital banking with Niyo Global!

*T&C Apply

The integrated Niyo Global app lets you manage your savings and wealth accounts seamlessly whether you are in India or travelling across the globe for business, pleasure, or studies.

Why choose Niyo Global?
✔️Premium High-interest digital savings account with up to 5% interest p.a. with a monthly payout
✔️ZERO forex markup* saves you 3-5% on all forex transactions
✔️FREE airport lounge access* at international & domestic terminals in India
✔️International VISA Signature debit card to use with any VISA-accepting merchant worldwide
✔️Accepted in 150+ countries, just add money in INR and spend anywhere
✔️Best-in-class acceptance for 100+ currencies, no worries of currency exchange across the world
✔️ZERO commission on direct mutual fund investments
✔️Systematic Investment Plans (SIPs) starting at just ₹100
✔️Track Employees’ Provident Fund (EPF) balance with just your mobile number & OTP
✔️Secured credit card to get full credit against FDs
✔️24x7 in-app live chat support to connect with us no matter where you are in the world

The INR-based Niyo Global international VISA Signature Debit Card lets you travel in style with no forex markup* and a best-in-class app. It’s a one-stop solution to handle your finances—savings and wealth—on the go whether you are in India or travelling to 150+ countries worldwide.

Niyo Global card takes away the hassle of loading different currencies on a multi-currency forex card since it automatically converts INR each time you use it to make a payment in a foreign currency. You no longer need a forex card or a travel card—the Niyo Global card does it all!

How to open a Niyo Global account?
Time: Less than 5 minutes
Documents: PAN, Aadhaar, Passport
Download the Niyo Global App
Verify your mobile number (linked to your Aadhaar and SIM present on your device)
Verify your Email ID
Enter your PAN details
Set your Passcode
Create your Savings, and Wealth accounts by following the simple intuitive steps on the app
If you are looking for a student travel card, the best forex cards for students, or the best business travel card, your search ends here. The Niyo Global card is the only international travel card you will need during your travels to manage all your finances on the go.

Download the app and experience the sheer brilliance of global digital banking with Niyo Global!

*T&C Apply

title: Niyo Global

creator: Finnew Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Global card with zero forex charges
2M+ Customers | Works in 150+ Countries | UPI Payments
Looking for the perfect travel forex card for international travel? The Niyo Global card is the only international travel card you’ll need to make forex payments cost-effectively at no extra fee. It is the perfect card for students abroad, and leisure & business travel. Get your zero forex markup Niyo Global card delivered in just 2-3 days.
What do you get?
- International zero forex markup card for global payments.
- Send money directly from your bank account through UPI Payments, Bank Transfer, Merchant Payment and scanning UPI QR - Powered by BHIM UPI
- High-interest Savings Account, exclusively for Indian passport holders.
- Integrated Niyo Global app to manage savings and wealth accounts seamlessly whether you are in India or travelling the world.

Why choose Niyo Global?
✔️ZERO forex markup* on all international transactions
✔️FREE airport lounge access* at international terminals in India
✔️Instant virtual card for online transactions
✔️Load in INR & spend in 150+ countries
✔️Global Coins: Rewards redeemable as cash
✔️Travel Mode: Trip planning & travel money management
✔️Instant Cash: Credit up to ₹5 lakh in just 4 minutes
✔️Nearby ATM Locator to withdraw cash globally
✔️Currency Convertor for live forex rates
✔️Track Employees’ Provident Fund (EPF)
✔️24x7 in-app live chat support
✔️ZERO commission on direct mutual funds
✔️Systematic Investment Plans (SIPs) starting at just ₹100

UPI on Niyo Pay
Niyo Pay works with any bank in India that supports BHIM UPI. Simply link your bank account to your UPI ID on this app
One UPI ID for all your bank accounts
Scan UPI QR: Scan QR & make instant payments at shops and merchants.
Pay via Mobile Number: Pay anyone, it doesn't matter which app they're on
Check Account Balance across multiple bank accounts like SBI, HDFC, ICICI & 140+ banks
Each transaction is secured with your 4 or 6 digit number UPI PIN.
How to open a Niyo Global account?
Time: Less than 5 minutes
Documents: PAN, Aadhaar, Indian Passport
1) Download the Niyo Global App
2) Verify your Mobile number & Email ID
3) Verify your Passport & Aadhaar details
4) Capture a quick selfie
5) Enter Personal & Nominee details
6) Complete your 3-minute Video KYC
7) Your Full-KYC Savings Account will be ready
8) Create Wealth Account by following the simple steps
Premium Niyo Global Perks
ZERO forex markup*: Shop, dine, travel and save up to 5% on all international transactions.

Complimentary airport lounge access*: Set off your journey in style and comfort at international terminals in India.

Global Coins: Unique rewards program for Referrals and Domestic spends. Redeem* them for cash across 150+ countries.

Travel Mode: Plan your trip with custom Travel Packages, Visa assistance, Travel Loans, Travel Insurance, Forex Cash at your doorstep & much more.

Instant Cash: Get credit up to ₹5 lakh for travel/personal use directly into your bank account in a 100% digital, document-less, and secured process.

24x7 in-app live chat support: Emergencies happen, so we’ll be here to help you no matter where you are in the world

ATM Locator: Find one nearby to withdraw local currency worldwide

Currency Converter: Live forex rates to know your purchase value upfront and avoid surprises later.
The INR-based Niyo Global card takes away the need for a multi-currency account & multi-currency card. If you are looking for a forex card, an international student card, an International Student Identity Card, a travel money card, or a travel forex card, your search ends here. The Niyo Global Card is the only global card you will need during your travels to make forex payments on the go.
Note: Niyo Global digital savings accounts and global cards are in partnership with DCB Bank, Equitas Small Finance Bank, and SBM Bank (India).
Download the app and experience the sheer brilliance of a zero forex markup international travel card with Niyo Global!
*T&C apply

title: Niyo Global

creator: Finnew Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Global travel card with zero forex charges
2M+ Customers | Works in 150+ Countries
The Niyo Global card is the only international travel card you’ll need to make international payments without paying any forex charges. It is the perfect card for students studying abroad, and leisure & business travellers. Get your zero forex markup Niyo Global cards delivered in just 2-3 days. Niyo Global cards are better than a travel forex card for international travellers.

Why choose Niyo Global?
✔️ZERO forex markup* on all international transactions
✔️FREE airport lounge access* at international terminals in India
✔️Get your card delivered within 3 days
✔️Load in INR & spend in 150+ countries
✔️Global Coins: Rewards on spends redeemable as cashback
✔️Travel Mode: Trip planning & travel money management
✔️Instant Cash: Credit up to ₹5 lakh in just 4 minutes
✔️Nearby ATM Locator to withdraw cash globally
✔️Currency Converter for live forex rates
✔️Track Employees’ Provident Fund (EPF) balance
✔️24x7 in-app live chat support irrespective of time zone
✔️ZERO commission on direct mutual fund investments
✔️Systematic Investment Plans (SIPs) starting at just ₹100


How to open a Niyo Global account?
Time: Less than 5 minutes
Documents: PAN, Aadhaar, Indian Passport
1) Download the Niyo Global App
2) Verify your Mobile number & Email ID
3) Verify your Passport & Aadhaar details
4) Capture a quick selfie
5) Enter Personal & Nominee details
6) Complete your 3-minute Video KYC
7) Your Full-KYC Savings Account will be ready
8) Your card will be delivered within 3 days

UPI on Niyo Pay
Niyo Pay works with any bank in India that supports BHIM UPI. Simply link your bank account to your UPI ID on this app.
One UPI ID for all your bank accounts.
Scan UPI QR: Scan QR & make instant payments at shops and merchants.
Pay via Mobile Number : Pay anyone, it doesn't matter which app they're are using
Check Account Balance across multiple bank accounts like SBI, HDFC, ICICI & 140+ banks.
Each transaction is secured with your 4 or 6 digit number UPI PIN.

Premium Niyo Global Perks
ZERO forex markup*: Shop, dine, travel and save up to 5% on all international transactions.

Complimentary airport lounge access*: Set off your journey in style and comfort at international terminals in India.

Global Coins: Unique rewards program for Referrals and Domestic spends. Redeem* them for cash across 150+ countries.

Travel Mode: Plan your trip with custom Travel Packages, Visa assistance, Travel Loans, Travel Insurance, Forex Cash at your doorstep & much more.

Instant Cash: Get credit up to ₹5 lakh for travel/ personal use directly into your bank account in a 100% digital, document-less, and secured process.

24x7 in-app live chat support: Emergencies happen, so we’ll be here to help you no matter where you are in the world.

ATM Locator: Find one nearby to withdraw local currency worldwide.

Currency Converter: Live forex rates to know your purchase value upfront and avoid surprises later.
The INR-based Niyo Global card takes away the need for a multicurrency account & multicurrency card. You can load in INR and transact in the currency of your current location abroad. Once you’re back in India, you can use your account balance for domestic POS/ECOM/ATM transactions and international ECOM. The Niyo Global Card is the only global card you will need during your travels to make forex payments on the go.
Note: Niyo Global digital savings accounts and global cards are in partnership with DCB Bank, Equitas Small Finance Bank, and SBM Bank (India).
Download the app and experience the sheer brilliance of a zero forex markup international travel card with Niyo Global!
*T&C apply

In case of any issues, please reach out to us at global@goniyo.com
descriptionShort: ZERO forex markup, Premium High-interest digital savings account

Finnew Solutions Private Limited

creator: Finnew Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
descriptionHtml:
Trusted by over 1M travellers worldwide, Niyo isn't just your usual card with zero forex markup. As a comprehensive international banking solutions platform, Niyo is the perfect destination for all your travel needs. With Niyo, you can get a zero forex markup card online, maximize your savings, use as UPI payment app, apply for visa and insurance—all while earning rewards as Niyo Coins.

Why Choose Niyo?
✓ Zero Forex Markup
✓ Free International ATM Withdrawals
✓ Visa Application
✓ Comprehensive Travel Insurance
✓ Use as UPI payment app
✓ Mobile banking app for international travel
✓ Rewards & Benefits
✓ 24x7 Chat Support
✓ Superfast Card Delivery
✓ Best card for students - Save big on studying abroad

What it means to travel the Niyo way:

Zero Forex Markup - With Niyo's zero forex markup cards, you can shop to your heart's content in 180+ countries without worrying about exchange rates or hidden fees. Every purchase will feel like a steal with savings up to 5%.

Free International ATM Withdrawals - With a Niyo zero forex markup card, your ATM withdrawal fees will be refunded as Niyo Coins, making your trips more rewarding than ever!

Global Lounge Access - Lounge like a boss across 1300+ locations with global lounge access on every 50K spent abroad with any card every quarter.

The Niyo app covers every step of your journey, from securing your visa to booking flights and offering immersive experiences.

Visa Application - Get your visa on time at the lowest prices every time on the Niyo app. Earn 40% Niyo coins on every visa purchase & if you don’t get your visa on time, we have a 100% service-fee-back guarantee.

Travel Insurance - With Niyo's comprehensive yet cheapest international travel insurance, you're covered for medical emergencies, trip cancellations, lost baggage, without the worry of any financial burden.

Online Booking: Flight Tickets - Our app offers a wide range of flight options at competitive prices and exclusive deals and discounts to help you save on your airfare, all while earning Niyo Coins with every booking. More than just a zero forex markup card, right?

Experiences - Niyo's partnerships with leading experience providers allow you to discover & book various activities tailored to your interests, ensuring every moment of your journey is filled with unforgettable memories.

Foreign Currency Delivery - Niyo is much more than a Zero Forex card. Skip the hassle of currency exchange queues with Niyo's foreign currency delivery service. Simply place your order on our app, and we'll deliver the currency of your choice directly to your doorstep.

24x7 Chat Support - Our experts are just a message away if you have any questions about your zero forex card benefits and offerings, need help with a transaction, or require travel advice.

Rewards & Benefits - Earn Niyo coins on every domestic spend with your debit & credit cards. Even better, you earn accelerated coins on all travel bookings on the Niyo app to book your next trip!

UPI with Niyo Pay - Manage your payments on the go with Niyo Pay, compatible with all major brands. Niyo Pay works with any bank in India that supports BHIM UPI. Simply link your bank account to your UPI ID on this app. Each transaction is secured with your 4 or 6-digit number UPI PIN.

The Niyo way to study abroad - Niyo helps students studying abroad save up ₹100,000 every year & earn up to 7.5% interest on their savings account balances.

Fast & Reliable Card Delivery - We understand that time is of the essence during travel planning, so we ensure your Niyo zero forex card reaches you within 3-5 days.

So, fellow travellers, get your Niyo Zero Forex Markup Card, download the Niyo app, pack your bags, and let your adventures begin!

TnC Apply. DCB Bank & SBM Bank issue all cards. These cards are available exclusively on the Niyo App and are linked to the respective savings accounts accessible on the app. Niyo itself is not a bank and doesn’t claim a banking license.
descriptionShort: Seamless travel with Niyo: Zero forex markup, Visa services, flights & insurance

Travel Insurance - With Niyo's comprehensive yet cheapest international travel insurance, you're covered for medical emergencies, trip cancellations, lost baggage, without the worry of any financial burden.

Online Booking: Flight Tickets - Our app offers a wide range of flight options at competitive prices and exclusive deals and discounts to help you save on your airfare, all while earning Niyo Coins with every booking. More than just a zero forex markup card, right?

Experiences - Niyo's partnerships with leading experience providers allow you to discover & book various activities tailored to your interests, ensuring every moment of your journey is filled with unforgettable memories.

Foreign Currency Delivery - Niyo is much more than a Zero Forex card. Skip the hassle of currency exchange queues with Niyo's foreign currency delivery service. Simply place your order on our app, and we'll deliver the currency of your choice directly to your doorstep.

24x7 Chat Support - Our experts are just a message away if you have any questions about your zero forex card benefits and offerings, need help with a transaction, or require travel advice.

Rewards & Benefits - Earn Niyo coins on every domestic spend with your debit & credit cards. Even better, you earn accelerated coins on all travel bookings on the Niyo app to book your next trip!

UPI with Niyo Pay - Manage your payments on the go with Niyo Pay, compatible with all major brands. Niyo Pay works with any bank in India that supports BHIM UPI. Simply link your bank account to your UPI ID on this app. Each transaction is secured with your 4 or 6-digit number UPI PIN.

The Niyo way to study abroad - Niyo helps students studying abroad save up ₹100,000 every year & earn up to 7.5% interest on their savings account balances.

Fast & Reliable Card Delivery - We understand that time is of the essence during travel planning, so we ensure your Niyo zero forex card reaches you within 3-5 days.

So, fellow travellers, get your Niyo Zero Forex Markup Card, download the Niyo app, pack your bags, and let your adventures begin!

TnC Apply. DCB Bank & SBM Bank issue all cards. These cards are available exclusively on the Niyo App and are linked to the respective savings accounts accessible on the app. Niyo itself is not a bank and doesn’t claim a banking license.
